member.name: IMFRelativePanelWatcher.BeginGetReport
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous request to get an interface that represents the relative panel location.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

Pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
| Return code | Description | |--------------|------------------------| |S_OK | The function succeeded.|

member.name: IMFRelativePanelWatcher.EndGetReport
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous request to get an interface that represents the relative panel location.
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the Invoke method.
A pointer to he interface that represents the relative panel location.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
| Return code | Description | |--------------|------------------------| |S_OK | The function succeeded.|

member.name: IMFRelativePanelWatcher
member.summary: Monitors the panel associated with a display, so that the app receives notifications when the relative location of the panel changes.
